description: Try our easy to follow Fish Cakes With Lemon & Lime Aioli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish Cakes With Lemon & Lime Aioli
name: Fish Cakes With Lemon & Lime Aioli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour enough oil into a frying pan until 2cm deep and place over medium heat. Cook cakes in batches, for 3 minutes each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a tray and cover to keep warm. Serve with aioli, lemon wedges and green salad.
